Flash Chat

An instant messaging Android app that uses Firebase as the backend.

Created using: Android Studio, Java and XML


Flash Chat is an instant messaging app similar to WhatsApp. Users can register accounts, sign in and text other users who are signed in. The messages are sent via Google's Firebase server. The app only supports text messages.
